content: परम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [परं परत्वं माति-क <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Most distant, last. {@--2@} Highest, best, most excellent, greatest; प्राप्नोति परमां गतिं <ls>Ms. 4. 14</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 1</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Chief, principal, primary, supreme; <ls>Ms. 8. 302</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 319.</ls> {@--4@} Exceeding, extreme. {@--5@} Adequate sufficient. {@--6@} Worst. {@--7@} Higher than, superior to; <ls>Pt. 1. 11.</ls> --मं The utmost or highest; the chief or prominent part; (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) consisting principally of, solely occupied with; कामोपभोगपरमा एतावदिति निश्चिताः <ls>Bg. 16. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 96.</ls> --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} A particle of assent, acceptance or agreement (well, very well, yes, be it so); ततः परमामित्युक्त्वा प्रतस्थे मुनिमंडलं <ls>Ku. 6. 35.</ls> {@--2@} Exceedingly, very much; परमक्रुद्धः &c.
